issue.title: [Release] Dockerize post-03-website.sh
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7046](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7046). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example on OSX the BSD date function doesn't accept the same arguments so the script fails.
